title: Bush on the 1990 Gulf War - situation

content.prompt: Which of the following events most directly led to President Bush believing that a new “world order” was emerging?

choices.label: United States military forces withdrawing from Vietnam
The spread of computers and global information networks
The end of the Cold War with the Soviet Union
Terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon

topic.text: 9.3: The End of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
